data.title: MetaFS.org: MetaFS::Cloud
data.meta_description: MetaFS, fully indexed filesystem focused on metadata (JSON)
data.text:
2.5. Music

Basic analysis of music using MetaFS::Semantics::Music (Essentia) currently.

Endpoint: http://localhost:20840/music

API:

Input:

audio: must be in MP3

key (optional): must be provided if apiKeyRequired is enabled on server side

Output:

lowlevel

rhythm

bpm

tonal

highlevel

danceability

gender

genre_* diverse genre conclusions

genres array of genres from different genre conclusions

mood_* diverse mood conclusions (acoustic, aggressive, electronic, happy, party, relaxed, sad)

moods array of moods

timbre

voice_instrumental

Examples
